Name: Soothe Globe
LongDescription: Prevents Fire-type moves from damaging Grass-type Pokémon. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Grass-type Pokémon.  You can get a Soothe Globe at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Grass Silk, a Grass Dust, and a Grass Gem. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
